track is not banked at the bend. the maximum speed at which a motorcycle can be ridden 
round the bend without slipping sideways is 28 m s–1. the motorcycle and its rider are 
modelled as a particle and air resistance is assumed to be negligible.

the motorcycle and the track are unchanged.
